template_files.title: configtemplate
template_files.content:
[general]

;Database connection settings
db.adapter=PDO_MYSQL
db.host=_Engines_Environment(dbhost)
db.username=_Engines_Environment(dbuser)
db.password="_Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)"
db.dbname=_Engines_Environment(dbhost)

;Security
security.cookie = [:security_cookie]

path.upload = /home/fs/persistence/upload
;path.logs = /tmp/logs
;path.temp = /tmp/temp
;path.feeds = /tmp/feeds

;Caching
;cache.content = 1
;cache.metadata = 1
;cache.path = /tmp/cache/

;Web deployment settings
web.host=_Engines_Builder(fqdn)
web.path=[:path]
web.redirect = 1
web.timezone=Europe/Brussels

;Global application settings
app.closed=1							; Set to 0 to enable registration
app.from_email=support@_Engines_Builder(domain_name)
app.admin_email=admin@_Engines_Builder(domain_name)
app.user=admin					; Comment this to switch to multi-user setup

;Debug settings
debug 	= 0
profile = 0


;; RSS settings
rss.default.hide_content=1

;; Flickr settings
[:flickr_comment]flickr.api_key=[:flickr_key]

;; Twitter settings
;; In order to integrate storytlr with twitter, you need to obtain OAuth application keys 
;; from Twitter directly (we are not allowed to redistribute keys). It is a simple process
;; that you can follow here: http://dev.twitter.com/apps
;;
;;twitter.consumer_key=
;;twitter.consumer_secret=
;;twitter.default.hide_replies=1

;; Seesmic settings
seesmic.default.hide_replies=1

;; Laconica settings
laconica.default.hide_replies=1

;; Youtube settings
;youtube.client_id=
;youtube.developer_key=

;; Google map
[:google_map_comment]gmap.key=[:google_map_key]

;Default values for user settings
default.theme=classic
default.timezone=Europe/Brussels
default.timezoneid=397
default.on_comment=1
default.on_news=1
default.title=My Homepage
default.subtitle=I'm still busy setting this page
